Reviews.Title: Bad Product
Reviews.Author: theogar13
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a gift for my son, the cell phone was received with some scratches and bumps, some applications such as record of my email not working, I am waiting that my son send me back the cell to see what we can do, because it doesn't work properly, I paid $375.00 for it, is not a new cell phone and was supposed to be. I want my money back or another cell phone...

Reviews.Title: not shipping
Reviews.Author: amazon
Reviews.Content: Phone has not come to your intended arrival date, please let me know what has happened with my purchase and eh echo various claims and nothing is not possible that I sent my phone never bought because they have not sent, please send me again My Money

Reviews.Title: 100% RECOMMENDED
Reviews.Author: Esperanza Carrillo "esperancita_carrillo"
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD DEAL ALL MY CONCERNS ANSWERED 100% recommended PHONE IN VERY GOOD CONDITIONTHANKS FOR EVERYTHINGExpects to make future purchases

Reviews.Title: The phone does not appear again
Reviews.Author: Marlin Parra
Reviews.Content: I received the phone and at first glance looks new but not a rebuilt phone, I am very disappointed that I bought as new and rebuilt

Reviews.Title: Different frequency
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: First of all I remind you that you were describing the telephone as follows: "It works on frequencies 850/900/1800/1900 MHz for GSM / GPRS / EDGE and operates at frequencies 850/1900/2100 MHz (5,2,1) for 3G" .But actually sent me a phone other than that, the phone that you sent me only works in (1,2,8 = 2100,1900,900 MHz frequency for 3G), you made a mistake because you sent is different from the frequency to 850MHz for 3G was what I really needed.(Movistar Peru).The cell does not have the printed branded (At&T;)As shown in the picture.Roberto Velásquez

Reviews.Title: BROKEN REFURBISHED PHONE SOLD AS BRAND NEW
Reviews.Author: Dalty
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Blackberry 9800 phone from this seller (Mid Star) that was advertised as brand new but this was NOT THE CASE. upon receipt of the phone I had the following problems:1. The BB pin does not work. I therefore cannot use the phones messaging capability which is the primary purpose why I bought the phone. It is practically useless.2. The phone does not read from the memory card.3. I took the phone to a technician who determined that the phone is REFURBISHED AND NOT BRAND NEW as claimed by MidStar.I feel cheated/ ripped off as I was sold a broken refurbished phone that was advertised and sold as brand new.

Reviews.Title: Great experience with the purchase process, and still satisfied with the product
Reviews.Author: salsa
Reviews.Content: Great experience with the purchase process, and still satisfied with the product.  I will definitly doing again and recomand others to purchase from this place.Thanks,

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: rhonda
Reviews.Content: i bought the phone for my son as a christmas gift.  when preparing to write a review for it i asked him to rate it for me and tell me how to rate it.  he said he gives it 50 billion points so if 5 stars is worth that much then thats what he chooses.  he says it is amazing and he falls more in love with it each day he has it.  so, i can give what i can only assume to be a great review of this product.  it defiantely passes a teenagers tests for approval in technology.

Reviews.Title: Como lo describian...
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Moreno (Merida-Vzla)
Reviews.Content: Los telefonos llegaron NUEVOS con todos sus accesorios y en sus cajas originales, el envio fue super rapido y los smartphones como los describian llegaron desbloqueados, con las bandas que describen y levantan 3G en Movistar Venezuela, recomiendo al vendedor plenamente...

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto
Reviews.Author: Victor Alvarez
Reviews.Content: El equipo, fue recibido nuevo como lo publican, fue enviado con todos sus accesorios originales, es un gran equipo, funciona con operadoras como movistar y movilnet en Venezuela levanta 3G, estoy muy feliz con mi teléfono, es nuevo de paquete, sus funciones todas operativas teclado, pantalla, cámara entre otros sin duda alguna una gran empresa producto de calidad!!

Reviews.Title: excelente compra
Reviews.Author: Danie R
Reviews.Content: Un excelente articulo el cual me llego antes de lo esperado con todos sus accesorios y en buen estado excelente para movistar y movilnet 3G en venezuela gracias.

Reviews.Title: QUESTION
Reviews.Author: MELISAD
Reviews.Content: HI! I JUST WANT TO KNOW IF I CAN USE THIS CELLPHONE IN ARGENTINA, IAM NOW LIVING IN USA BUT I LL TAKE IT WITH ME TO ARGENTINA AND PUT MY ARGENTINIAN SIM CARD, WLL THAT WORK? THANKS!

Reviews.Title: My New Smartphone Torch 9800
Reviews.Author: Elmer Gonzalez Herrera
Reviews.Content: I think that my blackberry AT&T; Torch 9800 is working as I just expected, since it belongs to the cutting edge technology. It means it is a worderful device that keep me updated every day and it is really dinamic and very helpful in my current job as a Dean of Engineering School in a peruvian university in South America.Sincerely,Elmer Gonzalez

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Torch!
Reviews.Author: FLUTTER
Reviews.Content: I have wanted this phone since it came onto the Market!  Since I am not with AT&T;, it was hard to find one less than $500.  I finally found this one for and I was told it was like new (used only 3 weeks). However, when the seller knew I was going to really purchase, he/she went up on the price!!! Considering that the phone had dings and scratches, and did not come with all the original parts, I thought this was a bit unfair.  I think purchases like this, should be required to have close-up photos, original paperwork and sellers should not be allowed to jack the price up without notice to possible buyers. After it was said and done, I could have bought a new one from Amazon for the same price, without the dings/scratches and with all the original parts for about the same price! I thought the packaging for mailing was lacking... at least for an expensive item like this one. The seller was pleasant and responsive to my emails and seemed to be a nice person. The phone works well thus far, and overall, I'm satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Devilfish
Reviews.Content: Beautiful piece of machinery, the 3G speed works way better than any other phone in my country. I would like to give a million stars rate for this awesome phone!

Reviews.Title: I Love my Blackberry
Reviews.Author: Mzzshyne
Reviews.Content: I got my blackberry today and i absolutely love it. It is unlocked as promised which means when I put in my sim from my kuwaity phone it worked no problems! This retailer is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Michael L Hensley
Reviews.Content: This Phone replaced a Blackberry 8830. This phone is a lot easier to use. this phone has a lot of apps and works a lot easier

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Connie Basenberg
Reviews.Content: Was a birthday gift for my son and he loves it! Now we can stay in touch all the time.

Reviews.Title: Phone was fake
Reviews.Author: Tray Lon
Reviews.Content: I bought this after my first one broke. I compared this one to the exact same model as my wife's T Mobile version and the crap was totally fake. When you slide the phone up, the back part of the phone was supposed to be "black" like my wife's but mine was "grey". The battery was made in Japan my wife's was made in China. I had a black berry logo in the top middle of the back cover below the camera in white letters and the back of my wife's phone did not. Her's had a description of the camera size and its capabilities. Her's said something like "2.5 megapixels". The screen kept freezing over and over which was pissing me off.Lastly the got damn red power button/ hang up button did not work unless I pushed it down HARD and it didnt even make the clicking noise nor could I feel it like I was pushing a "button". I wish I had pictures of all the comparisons to support my argument but after about a month of tolerating this phone and the broke power button and being unable to hang up after a conversation having to rely on the other party to hang up first, I slammed the phone into a million pieces and went and bought me a Galaxy S3 Mini which has not given me ANY problems like this stupid phone did.

Reviews.Title: second 9800
Reviews.Author: D.Leith
Reviews.Content: multi function fully loaded easy to use great memory and condition hoping to get a next one soon at the same price lol.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: ClLy
Reviews.Content: Like a blackberry and smart phone all in one. Seems really nice and looks as though it is new and clean, it didn't come with the CD software, will need to inquire about that. I will say that it does seem a little more effort to slide up the phone that what I would like but I'm glad to have the physical keyboard. (it also has the virtual touch screen keyboard too.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: irving brea
Reviews.Content: buen producto, cumple con lo esperado y me parecio un buen precio. esta marca la usa toda la familiamuchas gracias

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Joel Perez
Reviews.Content: Aunque la entrega fue muy larga me encuentro sastisfecho por el producto todo ok de acuerdo a lo solicitado .

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Isabel Romero
Reviews.Content: todo muy bien el telefono en excelentes condiciones 100% recomendado no estuve problemas todo fue muy bien tal y como lo anuncian

Reviews.Title: Very usefull cell phone
Reviews.Author: Cedeno Johanna "Leonardo Villarroel"
Reviews.Content: Phone The Blackberry Torch 9800 is a very complete and useful phone for both office work and for the use of many useful tools for different types of needs!

Reviews.Title: A TOMMATO CAN AND WIRE WOULD BE BETTER.
Reviews.Author: PW
Reviews.Content: A bonfire piece of crap. Goes haywire 3 or 4 times a week, e.g., screen icons will not appear and phone will simply not work. Constantly need to reboot.My wife bought an unlocked I phone the same time I purchased this lemon, cost a lot more but works far better, and is far more user friendly. Like driving a BMW vs. a pinto.Don't even think about it. Buy ANTHING ELSE, but not this piece of crap.

Reviews.Title: ADA
Reviews.Author: ada de barroeta
Reviews.Content: excelente producto funciona perfectamente sin ningun tipo de falla  no tuve problema alguno con el y el envio fue rapido

Reviews.Title: Muy buen producto, desde Vzla 3G movistar y movilnet

Reviews.Content: muy buen producto, llego con todo lo dicho en la publicacion, levanta 3G en venezuela con movistar y movilnet, mas algunos extras que mando el vendedor. no tengo de que quejarme hasta el momento

Reviews.Title: Todo Excelente
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Rios "Gabiar77"
Reviews.Content: El envió fue muy rápido, el producto llego en perfectas condiciones y como se describía en el anuncio. recomendado 100%

Reviews.Title: excellent phone ... I love ...

Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my nephew .. to see him is the maximum encato tells me, keeps saying wonders .. I told him that I bought on amazon and told me to thank them for sending the phone was very fast and well protected .. thank you very much

Reviews.Title: RECOMMENDED
Reviews.Author: Liliana
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone for my son as a christmas gift. when preparing to write a review for it i asked him to rate it for me and tell me how to rate it. he said he gives it 50 billion points so if 5 stars is worth that much then thats what he chooses. he says it is amazing and he falls more in love with it each day he has it. so, i can give what i can only assume to be a great review of this product. it defiantely passes a teenagers tests for approval in technology.

Reviews.Title: Product quality is good

Reviews.Content: Product quality is good .. is according to the price paid .. recommend this product is just what I needed

Reviews.Content: excellent care, the product is such that it was described, I recommend to have in mind when they wish to shop ...

Reviews.Title: muy bueno

Reviews.Content: muy bueno el articulo lo recomiendo muy buenos vendedores me llego hace una semana aun lo tengo en periodo de prueba y hasta la fecha no me ha fallado

Reviews.Content: Compre este teléfono porque me gustaba mucho y acá en mi país es muy caro, cuando me llego funciono a la perfección, tanto así que con otros cupos de dólares le compre uno también a mi novia.

Reviews.Title: buen telefono

Reviews.Content: el telefono fue como lo describio la tienda. me llego a tiempo y le funciono la banda 1900 por que at&t; tambien utiliza esa banda.

Data Input & Navigation Trackpad located on front face of device, ESC key to the right
Display 3.2" HVGA+ touch screen (480x360) Font size (user selectable)
